briefdescription.para: Locally-stored number of atoms to be used.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid only for categorical q-network.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored discount rate for future reward.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid for both async RL agent and q-learning agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored indicator for double q-learning.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid only for q-learning agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored exploration steps before learning.

detaileddescription.para: The agent won't start learn until those steps have passed. This is valid only for q-learning agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored gradient limit.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid only for async RL agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored indicator for categorical q-learning.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid only for q-learning agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored indicator for noisy q-learning.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid only for q-learning agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored number of workers.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid only for async RL agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored parameter for softly updating q networks.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid only for Soft Actor-Critic.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored step limit of each episode.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid for both async RL agent and q-learning agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored step size of optimizer.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid for both async RL agent and q-learning agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored interval for syncing target network.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid for both async RL agent and q-learning agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored update interval.

detaileddescription.para: Update interval is similar to batch size, however the update is done one by one. This is valid only for async RL agent.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored maximum value of support.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid only for categorical q-network.

briefdescription.para: Locally-stored minimum value of support.

detaileddescription.para: This is valid only for categorical q-network.

memberdef.argsstring: (size_t numWorkers, size_t updateInterval, size_t targetNetworkSyncInterval, size_t stepLimit, size_t explorationSteps, double stepSize, double discount, double gradientLimit, bool doubleQLearning, bool noisyQLearning, bool isCategorical, size_t atomSize, double vMin, double vMax, double rho)
memberdef.name: TrainingConfig

briefdescription.para: Get the number of atoms.
Modify the number of atoms.
Get the discount rate for future reward.
Modify the discount rate for future reward.
Get the indicator of double q-learning.
Modify the indicator of double q-learning.
Get the exploration steps.
Modify the exploration steps.
Get the limit of update gradient.
Modify the limit of update gradient.
Get the indicator of categorical q-learning.
Modify the indicator of categorical q-learning.
Get the indicator of noisy q-learning.
Modify the indicator of double q-learning.
Get the amount of workers.
Modify the amount of workers.
Get the rho value for sac.
Modify the rho value for sac.
Get the maximum steps of each episode.
Modify the maximum steps of each episode.

detaileddescription.para: Setting it to 0 means no limit.

briefdescription.para: Get the step size of the optimizer.
Modify the step size of the optimizer.
Get the interval for syncing target network.
Modify the interval for syncing target network.
Get the update interval.
Modify the update interval.
Get the maximum value for support.
Modify the maximum value for support.
Get the minimum value for support.
Modify the minimum value for support.
